name: Catch - "Escaping Hades"
description:
Controls: Left and Right Arrow Keys

Story: 

You are a fallen Greek hero who has found themself in the fearful and treacherous underworld! When you fell, your soul shattered into many pieces! To escape Hades, you must guide the Kharon and his boat to collect at least 10 pieces of your soul to be whole again - but watch out! If you collect corrupted soul shards, you risk becoming a corrupted soul, becoming on of Hades' monsters!
